item.title: ‘Jurassic World Rebirth’ Leads China Box Office Again as ‘Superman’ Debuts at No. 4
item.description: Universal’s “Jurassic World Rebirth” retained its lead at the China box office for a second weekend, earning RMB80.2 million ($11.1 million) from July 11–13, according to data from Artisan Gateway. Th

item.title: Kanye “Ye” West Struggles Through Chaotic, Rain-Soaked Shanghai Concert
item.description: Attendees at the July 12 gig at the Shanghai Stadium were chanting for a refund after Ye appeared over 40 minutes late and the event was mired with technical problems and poor weather.

item.title: Kanye “Ye” West Struggles Through Chaotic, Rain-Soaked Shanghai Concert
item.description: Attendees at the July 12 gig at the Shanghai Stadium were chanting for a refund after Ye appeared over 40 minutes late and the event was mired with technical problems and poor weather.
